document.full_text: a macabre welcoming committee greeted new arrivals to abidjan from its northern access road on tuesday morning: a dozen corpses lined up on a road bank by a petrol station, bullet wounds to their heads.
document.title: macabre welcoming committee greets abidjan visitors
lines_and_colors: a macabre welcoming committee greeted new arrivals to abidjan from its northern access road on tuesday morning: a dozen corpses lined up on a road bank by a petrol station, bullet wounds to their heads.
